dct_title_s:
Carte de L'Afrique Divisée en ses principaux Etats pour servir à
          l'instruction de la Jeunesse
dct_alternative_sm: Map of Africa divided into states
dct_description_sm:
Illustrates "routes of Cook's voyages of 1771, 1775 and 1780 around the Cape of Good
        Hope to Australia". Text borders decribe interior of Africa; Prime meridian through Paris
        and Ferro Island.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
